title: A proclamation for quieting the post-master general his deputies and assigns in the execution of his office James R.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)
publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill deceas'd, and by Henry Hills, and Thomas Newcomb ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
At head of title: By the King, a proclamation.
At end of text: Given at our court at Windsor the seventh day of September, 1685.
